statements: DELETE FROM banned_users WHERE id = 123 AND username = 'user1'
DELETE FROM banned_ips WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM banned_users WHERE reason LIKE '%abusive%' ORDER BY ban_time DESC)
DELETE FROM blacklist_users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND email = 'john_doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM banned_ips WHERE reason = 'Spamming' AND ban_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ban_reports WHERE user_id = 3 AND ip_id = 5;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_type = 'Login';
DELETE FROM ban_logs WHERE reason_id = 5 AND ban_date < '2022-01-01';
